amendment.description: Amendment sought to include Congressional findings on various facts about the HAMP program, including cost and number of permanent modifications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 112-34 to include Congressional findings on various facts about the HAMP program, including cost and number of permanent modifications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ellison.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
